name: GGJ 2023 - The Roots of Baking
description:
You'd like to bake a cake, but your pantry's empty! The ingredients you need are scattered throughout the world - and throughout time. Explore to find them!

Created for Global Game Jam 2023.

E - Interact

T - Change the era

-

Map design: heftyllama
Programming: curricle
UI sprites: Aaron Jordan
Music: Johnnie Jordan
